Header.title: Welcome
Header.paragraph: My Name is Voltaire Vergara, I have background in Software Engineering and Data Science!

About.paragraph: highly disciplined individual with a growth mindset to face any adversity and intellectual curiosity to find solutions. Thus, I have the equanimity and focus to handle the responsibility of being a technologist, especially roles involving Data Science and Software Engineering.  Currently, I have already finished my degree in Computer Science and minor in Statistics during December of 2021 at the University at Buffalo. Because of my background in these fields, I am familiar with the fundamental theories and concepts that data scientists and software engineers employ.

Testimonials.text: The International Conference on Computational Social Science (IC2S2) is the premier conference bringing together researchers from different disciplines interested in using computational and data-intensive methods to solve problems relevant to society.
Testimonials.name: International Conference for Computational Social Science

Testimonials.text: Canceled due to covid - The Society for Social Work and Research (SSWR), incorporated in 1994, is a non‚Äêprofit, professional membership organization. SSWR supports social workers, social welfare professionals, social work students, social work faculty and researchers in related fields.
Testimonials.name: Society for Social Work and Research

Testimonials.text: University at Buffalo's graduate school's student research symposium where I presented the ongoing work regarding an implementation of an early warning system that tries to predict gentrification
Testimonials.name: University at Buffalo Student Research Symposium
